title.narrative: Program to Support Public Private Partnerships in Infrastructure
Programa de Apoyo a Participacion Publico Privada en Infraestructura

description.narrative: The program aims to facilitate and encourage private participation to promote improvements in service delivery and quality of infrastructure, through the technical, institutional and regulatory strengthening of entities that develop infrastructure, and the technical-economic, financial and legal structuration of private projects in various sectors.
